step_0.title: üìú Wamukelekile ku-SafetyHelp
step_0.description: Hlola izinsiza zethu ezibanzi kanye nezinsizakusebenza zokuthuthukisa ukuphepha nezempilo endaweni yakho yokusebenza.
step_0.fun_fact: ‚ö° Ngabe uyazi ukuthi ukusebenzisa abahlinzeki abanokuziphatha okuhle kunganciphisa izingozi endaweni yokusebenza ngokuqinisekisa ukuthi umsebenzi wenziwa ngesikhathi futhi ngezinga eliphezulu lokuphepha?

intro.title: Wamukelekile ku-SafetyHelp
intro.description: Hlola izinsiza zethu ezibanzi kanye nezinsizakusebenza zokuthuthukisa ukuphepha nezempilo endaweni yakho yokusebenza.

welcome.title: Wamukelekile ku-SafetyHelp
welcome.description: Iplatifomu yakho ethembekile yokuphepha nezempilo emsebenzini (OHS) eNingizimu Afrika. Sinikezela ngezinsiza ezizenzakalelayo, ezithuthukiswe yi-AI ukuqinisekisa ukuphepha nokuthobela izikole, amasonto, kanye nezindawo ezingahlelekile. Joyina umphakathi wethu ukuze uthole izinsiza, izinsizakalo, kanye nokusekelwa okwenziwe ngezifiso zezidingo zakho.

why_choose.title: Kungani Ukhetha iSafetyHelp ukuThobela i-OHS?
why_choose.content: I-SafetyHelp ingumlingani wakho othembekile wokuthobela ukuphepha nezempilo emsebenzini eNingizimu Afrika. Iplatifomu yethu inikezela ngezinsiza ezibanzi ezilungiselelwe ukuhlangabezana nezidingo eziyingqayizivele zezimboni ezifana nokwakha, izimayini, kanye nokukhiqiza. Kusukela ekuqaleni kweerejista ezisemthethweni kuya ekuhloleni ubungozi, iSafetyHelp yenza lula izidingo ze-OHS ezinzima ngezinsiza ezisebenziseka kalula kanye nokusekelwa kwesikhathi sangempela nge-chatbot yethu ephefumlelwe yi-AI. Isekwa yimithetho yaseNingizimu Afrika kanye nezindlela ezinhle, sinika amabhizinisi amandla okudala izindawo zokusebenza eziphephile ngenkathi siqinisekisa ukuthobela i-OHSA kanye ne-COIDA. Joyina izinkulungwane zabachwepheshe abethembele kwi-SafetyHelp ukuvikela amaqembu abo kanye nokwenza lula izinqubo zokuphepha.

client.title: Izibopho Zeklayenti
client.reg_5_1_a: Umthetho Wokwakha 5(1)(a): Lungiselela Ukuhlola Ubungozi Obusisiseko (BRA) okukhomba izingozi zephrojekthi.
client.reg_5_1_b: Umthetho Wokwakha 5(1)(b): Nikeza Isichibiyelo Sokuphepha Nezempilo esicacisa izidingo ezithile zephrojekthi.
client.reg_5_1_l: Umthetho Wokwakha 5(1)(l): Yamukela Uhlelo Lwezokuphepha Nezempilo Lwekontraka ngaphambi kokuba umsebenzi uqale.

contractor.title: Izibopho Zekontraka
contractor.reg_7_1_a: Umthetho Wokwakha 7(1)(a): Ngenisa Uhlelo Lwezokuphepha Nezempilo olusekelwe kusichibiyelo seklayenti.
contractor.reg_7_1_b: Umthetho Wokwakha 7(1)(b): Gcina Ifayile Yezokuphepha Nezempilo esizeni enazo zonke izincwadi ezidingekayo.
contractor.reg_9: Umthetho Wokwakha 9: Qhuba Ukuhlola Ubungozi kanye Nokuqashelwa Kwezingozi Zokuphazamisa (HIRAs) ezithile kumsebenzi.

professional.title: Izibopho Zochwepheshe Wokuphepha Nezempilo
professional.reg_5_5: Umthetho Wokwakha 5(5): Ama-Arhente (PrCHSA) alawula ukuphepha nezempilo egameni leklayenti, eqinisekisa ukuthobela.
professional.reg_8_5: Umthetho Wokwakha 8(5): Amagosa (CHSO) asiza okontraka ekusebenziseni nasekuhloleni izinhlelo ze-OHS.
professional.sacpcmp: Iziqondiso ze-SACPCMP: Kumele igcine ukubhaliswa kanye nezidingo ze-CPD zesimo sobuchwepheshe.

wizard.step_0: Sicela ukhethe isenzo ukuze uqale inqubo.

step_1.title: Isinyathelo 1 kwezi-9: Ufuna ukwenzani?
step_1.label: Khetha Amadokhumenti ozowadibanisa (Khetha zonke ezisebenzayo):
step_1.error: Sicela ukhethe okungenani idokhumenti eyodwa ukuze idityaniswe.

step_8.title: Isinyathelo 8 kwezi-9: Ihlanganiselwe
step_8.specify_error: Sicela ucacise ukuthi idokhumenti ihlanganiselwe bani.

step_9.title: Isinyathelo 9 kwezi-9: Buyekeza futhi Yongeza ku-Cart
step_9.description: Buyekeza okukhethiwe kwakho futhi yongeza amadokhumenti ku-cart yakho ukuze uqhubeke.

cart.title: I-Cart Yakho
cart.invoice_reference: Inombolo Yereferensi Ye-invoyisi: (Isebenza izinsuku ezi-7. Bhalisa ukuze igcinwe unomphela!)

resources.title: Xhumana Nochwepheshe Bezempilo Nezokuphepha Abagunyaziwe
resources.description: Udinga usizo lochwepheshe? Thinta ochwepheshe abagunyaziwe ngezidingo zephrojekthi yakho.
resources.jane_doe: Jane Doe, I-Arhente ye-SACPCMP (PrCHSA) - Inombolo Yokubhalisa: PR12345 - Uxhumana naye: jane.doe@example.com

chatbot.response: Ngilapha ukuze ngikusize! Ngezinsiza ze-OHS ezenzelwe wena, sicela uxhumane nochwepheshe.

construction.title: Ukuphepha Kokwakha
construction.description: Qinisekisa ukuthobela imithetho yokuphepha nezempilo yokwakha usebenzisa izinsiza ze-OHS zeSafetyHelp. Izinsiza zethu zikusiza ulawule ubungozi, uthobele izidingo zomthetho, futhi uvikele abasebenzi esizeni, ukhipha izindlela ezingcono ezichazwe ku-'Safety First: The Essentials of OHS Plans.'

legal_appointments.title: Ukuqashwa Okusemthethweni
legal_appointments.description: Lawula ukuqashwa okusemthethweni kokuphepha nezempilo emsebenzini njengoba kudingwa yimithetho ye-OHS yaseNingizimu Afrika. Sebenzisa i-organogram ukuze unikeze izindima, ugcwalise imininingwane yomuntu oqashiwe, futhi ukhiqize idokhumenti ebanzi enezincwadi zokuqashwa, amarekhodi okuqeqesha, nokunye.

legislation.title: Umthetho
legislation.description: Finyelela kulabhulali ebanzi yemithetho ye-OHS, izindinganiso, kanye nokuhleziwa. Khiqiza iirejista ze-OHS ezisemthethweni, sesha imithetho ethile, futhi uhlola ubudlelwano phakathi kwemithetho. Izichazelo ezilula ziyatholakala ukuze zithengwe ukuze kwenziwe amadokhumenti omthetho anzima afinyeleleke kakhudlwana.

services.title: Izinsizakalo zeSafetyHelp
services.description: Thola uhla lwezinsizakalo zokuphepha nezempilo emsebenzini eziklanyelwe ukusekela izindawo zokusebenza, izikole, amasonto, kanye nezindawo ezingahlelekile kulo lonke elaseNingizimu Afrika. Kusukela ekuboniseni kuya ekuqeqesheni, iSafetyHelp inikezela ngezixazululo ezilungiselelwe ukuqinisekisa ukuthobela nokuphepha.

consulting.title: Ukubonisana nge-OHS
consulting.description: Thola izeluleko zochwepheshe mayelana nokuthobela i-OHS, ukulawulwa kobungozi, kanye nokuqashwa okusemthethweni kubachwepheshe bethu abagunyaziwe. Sisebenze nezinhlangano ezifana ne-Anglo Platinum, ABSA, kanye ne-Metrorail ukuhambisa izixazululo ezilungiselelwe.

training.title: Izinhlelo Zokuqeqesha
training.description: Finyelela ezinhlelweni zokuqeqesha ezibanzi zazo zonke izimboni, okuhlanganisa ukwakha, ukukhiqiza, kanye nemfundo. Khetha phakathi kokuqeqesha kokuqala, izifundo ezithile zokusebenza, nokunye, konke kuhambisana nemithetho ye-OHS yaseNingizimu Afrika.

audits.title: Ukuhlola & Ukuhlolwa
audits.description: Qinisekisa ukuthi indawo yakho yokusebenza ifinyelela ezindinganisweni ze-OHS ngezinsizakalo zethu zokuhlola nokuhlolwa. Izinsiza zethu zikusiza ukwenza ukuhlola okuphelele, ukukhiqiza izinhlalo, kanye nokusebenzisa izenzo zokulungisa.

risk_management.title: Izinhlelo Zokulawulwa Kobungozi
risk_management.description: Khiqiza izinhlelo zokulawulwa kobungozi (RMPs) ezilungiselelwe ezibandakanya umthetho waseNingizimu Afrika, imithetho kamasipala, kanye nezindinganiso zomhlaba wonke ezifana ne-ISO 45001, ukuqinisekisa ukuthi ibhizinisi lakho lilungiselele noma yibuphi ubungozi.

support.title: Ukusekela & Izinsiza Zomphakathi
support.description: Joyina umphakathi wethu ukuze ubike izigameko, ufinyelele kuluhlu lokuhlola ukuphepha lwezitolo ezincane, izikole, kanye nezindawo zokudlela, futhi uxhumane nabanye ochwepheshe be-OHS ukuze uthole ukusekela kanye nokusebenzisana.

training.title: Ukuqeqesha Okuphelele Kwendawo Yokusebenza
training.description: Hlola izinhlelo zethu zokuqeqesha ezibanzi zendawo yokusebenza ukuqinisekisa ukuthobela imithetho ye-OHS yaseNingizimu Afrika kanye nokukhuthaza indawo yokusebenza ephephile. Khetha ukuqeqesha okusebenzayo, ukuqeqesha kweqembu, noma usebenzise i-wizard yethu ukuze uthole iziphakamiso ezilungiselelwe ngokusekelwe kwishishini lakho, ababukeli ekujoliswe kubo, kanye nendawo.

wizard.start: Sicela ukhethe ukhetho ukuze uqale inqubo yesiphakamiso sokuqeqesha.

step_2.title: Isinyathelo 2 kwezi-5: Khetha Ababukeli Bakho ekujoliswe kubo
step_2.label: Ababukeli ekujoliswe kubo (Khetha zonke ezisebenzayo):
step_2.error: Sicela ukhethe okungenani ababukeli abakujoliswe kubo.
step_2.option_emergency_team: Ithimba Lesimo Esiphuthumayo (Abasizi Bokuqala, Abacimi Bomlilo)

step_5.title: Isinyathelo 5 kwezi-5: Buyekeza Ukuqeqesha Okuphakanyisiweyo
step_5.description: Ngokusekelwe kulwazi olufakileyo, nazi izinhlelo zokuqeqesha eziphakanyisiweyo. Khetha lezo ofuna ukuzifaka ku-cart yakho.

cart.title: I-Cart Yakho Yokuqeqesha

customization.title: Lungiselela Izinsiza Zakho Zokuqeqesha
customization.emergency_line_error: Sicela ufake inombolo yokuxhumana yesimo esiphuthumayo esebenzayo (isb., +27123456789).

checkout.disclaimer: Ukuzikhulula kweSafetyHelp: Izinsiza zokuqeqesha ezinikeziwe zenzelwe izinjongo zolwazi kuphela futhi azinikezi izeluleko zobuchwepheshe. Ngezixazululo ze-OHS ezenzelwe wena, thinta iSafetyHelp ku support@safetyhelp.co.za noma vakashela Ikhasi Lokuxhumana.

cart.success: Ukukhokha kuphumelele! Izinsiza zakho zokuqeqesha sezenziwe. Landa ama-PDF akho ngezansi. Ngokuqeqesha ku-inthanethi, amakhodi okufinyelela athunyelwe kuwe nge-imeyili.

providers.title: Abahlinzeki Bokuqeqesha Abagunyaziwe
providers.description: Udinga ukuqeqesha komuntu? Thinta abahlinzeki bokuqeqesha abagunyaziwe ngezidingo zakho.
providers.provider_1: I-ABC Training Solutions - i-SETA Evunyiweyo - Igxile kuNcedo lokuQala, ukuCima uMlilo - Unxibelelwano: info@abctraining.co.za

purchase.title: Thenga Imanuwali Yokuqeqesha Elungisekayo
purchase.description: Thola imanuwali yokuqeqesha ebanzi elungiselelwe inkampani yakho, okuhlanganisa izidingo zomthetho, okuqukethwe okuthile kwenkampani okusekelwe kwiprofayili yakho yobungozi, kanye namakhothi avela kubahlinzeki bokuqeqesha abagunyaziwe.

risk_profile.title: Chaza Iprofayili Yakho Yobungozi Yemanuwali Yokuqeqesha
risk_profile.label: Iprofayili Yobungozi:

legal_fact.step_1: Iqiniso Lomthetho: Isigaba 8 se-OHS Act sidinga ukuthi abaqashi banikeze ukuqeqesha okwenziwe ngezifiso zezingozi ezithile zendawo yokusebenza.
legal_fact.step_3: Iqiniso Lomthetho: Omasipala bendawo bangaba nemithetho ye-OHS ehlukile ethinta izidingo zokuqeqesha.

fun_fact.step_2: Iqiniso Elimnandi: Ngabe uyazi ukuthi ukuqeqesha okujwayelekile kunganciphisa izingozi zendawo yokusebenza kuze kufike ku-30%?
fun_fact.step_4: Iqiniso Elimnandi: Izindawo zokusebenza ezinobungozi obuphezulu ezifana nezindawo zokwakha zidinga ukuqeqesha okujwayelekile ukuze kugcinwe izindinganiso zokuphepha.
